author: vsemozhetbyt
message:
doc: update NODE_OPTIONS section in cli.md

PR-URL: https://github.com/nodejs/node/pull/21229
Reviewed-By: Luigi Pinca <luigipinca@gmail.com>
Reviewed-By: Richard Lau <riclau@uk.ibm.com>
Reviewed-By: Rich Trott <rtrott@gmail.com>
Reviewed-By: Roman Reiss <me@silverwind.io>
Reviewed-By: James M Snell <jasnell@gmail.com>
Reviewed-By: Trivikram Kamat <trivikr.dev@gmail.com>

files.patch:
@@ -513,22 +513,30 @@ that is not allowed in the environment is used, such as `-p` or a script file.
 
 Node options that are allowed are:
 - `--enable-fips`
+  `--experimental-modules`
+  `--experimental-repl-await`
+  `--experimental-vm-modules`
+  `--experimental-worker`
 - `--force-fips`
 - `--icu-data-dir`
+- `--inspect`
 - `--inspect-brk`
 - `--inspect-port`
-- `--inspect`
+  `--loader`
+  `--napi-modules`
 - `--no-deprecation`
+  `--no-force-async-hooks-checks`
 - `--no-warnings`
 - `--openssl-config`
+  `--pending-deprecation`
 - `--redirect-warnings`
 - `--require`, `-r`
 - `--throw-deprecation`
 - `--tls-cipher-list`
 - `--trace-deprecation`
-- `--trace-events-categories`
-- `--trace-events-enabled`
+- `--trace-event-categories`
 - `--trace-event-file-pattern`
+- `--trace-events-enabled`
 - `--trace-sync-io`
 - `--trace-warnings`
 - `--track-heap-objects`

@@ -3151,6 +3151,7 @@ static void CheckIfAllowedInEnv(const char* exe, bool is_env,
 
   static const char* whitelist[] = {
     // Node options, sorted in `node --help` order for ease of comparison.
+    // Please, update NODE_OPTIONS section in cli.md if changed.
     "--enable-fips",
     "--experimental-modules",
     "--experimental-repl-await",
